TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EncryptionPropertyCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
Public NotInheritable Class EncryptionPropertyCollection Implements IList
public ref class EncryptionPropertyCollection sealed : System::Collections::IList
type EncryptionPropertyCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示 XML 加密中使用的 类的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of classes used in XML encryption.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类封装``World Wide Web 联合会 XML 加密规范所定义的元素位于http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/。The class encapsulates the `` element defined by the World Wide Web Consortium XML Encryption specification located at http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/. 使用类以提供与相关的其他加密信息和元素。Use the class to provide additional encryption information related to the and elements. 例如，此类可用于指定时间戳。For example, you can use this class to specify a time stamp. ## Examples 下面的代码示例进行加密和解密 XML 文档。The following code example encrypts and decrypts an XML document. 此代码示例创建对象，其中包含有关自定义信息元素，并添加对象传递给的集合类。This code example creates an object that contains custom information about the element, and adds the object to the collection of the class. 最后，此代码示例还显示有关的信息对象和集合。Finally, this code example displays information about the object and the collection. [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML.EncryptionProperty#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.EncryptionProperty/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML.EncryptionProperty#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.EncryptionProperty/vb/sample.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsFixedSize As Boolean
public: property bool IsFixedSize { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 对象是否具有固定大小。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the object has a fixed size.

value.span: 如果 对象具有固定大小，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the object has a fixed size; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有固定大小的集合不允许添加或删除元素的集合创建，但允许修改现有元素后。A collection with a fixed size does not allow the addition or removal of elements after the collection is created, but does allow the modification of existing elements. 具有固定大小的集合是只需具有防止添加和移除元素的包装器的集合。A collection with a fixed size is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents adding and removing elements. 因此，如果在更改基础集合，包括添加或删除的元素，大小固定集合反映了这些更改。Therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, including the addition or removal of elements, the fixed-size collection reflects those changes.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsReadOnly As Boolean
public: property bool IsReadOnly { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 对象是否为只读。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the object is read-only.

value.span: 如果 对象为只读，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the object is read-only; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在创建只读集合后，该集合不允许添加、移除或修改元素。A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created. 集合是只读的只是一个集合与可防止修改集合; 的包装器因此，如果对基础集合进行更改，只读集合反映了这些更改。A collection that is read-only is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents modifying the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes.
